mapper.select: select count(*) from roles r left join authorities a on r.name = a.authority left join users u on u.username = a.username where r.name like #{keyword}

select r.id, r.name, r.description, r.created_at, r.updated_at, u.id as userId, u.username as userName from roles r left join authorities a on r.name = a.authority left join users u on u.username = a.username where r.name like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}
